categories: Category:Star Wars: Return of the Jedi

nodes.text: Star Wars: Return of the Jedi 3: Mission to Endor is the third issue of the Star Wars: Return of the Jedi mini-series and is part of the Marvel Star Wars series of comic books.
Part three of a four issue mini-series of the Return of the Jedi movie adaptation.
Unlike the other two previous Marvel Star Wars Movie Adaptations, A New Hope & the Empire Strikes Back, this was not part of the regular series.
There are five pin-up pages in this issue, Scout trooper, Lando Calrissian, Home One, Emperor Palpatine & a TIE Interceptor all by Rick J. Bryant.
The Rebels travel to Endor to deactivate the Death Star II's deflector shield, while Luke Skywalker tells Leia Organa of her true heritage.
